text: Wadiyara Koli is an Indo-Aryan language spoken in Sindh, Pakistan and Gujarat, India.https://www.ialtrust.org/resources/A-Phonological-Description-of- Wadiyari.pdf Wadiyara Koli is closely related to Kachi Koli. == References == Category:Languages of Sindh Category:Languages of India Category:Indo-Aryan languages
title: Wadiyara Koli language
